text: Gary Liddell (27 August 1954 â€“ 29 April 2015) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a striker. He played from 1972 and 1983 for the teams Leeds United, Grimsby Town, Hearts and Doncaster Rovers. Liddell was born in Stirling. His son, Andy (born 1973), was also a footballer. Liddell died on 1 May 2015 in Falkirk, aged 60. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Footballers from Stirling Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players
title: Gary Liddell
